Title: Hail the Judge
Actors: Stephen Chow, Man Cheung, Man-Tat Ng
Plot: Pao Lung-Sing, a descendant of the famous Judge Pao Ching Tient, is a 9th degree corrupt judge (lowest degree) who changes his tune when he tries to champion a woman Chi Siu-Lin, who was framed for killing her husband. As a result...
